room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: Celebrated my husbands 40th!! Wicked fun. We love escape rooms- this location is at the top of our list now. Will watch for new games to come. Going back to do Hostage with our 2 kids soon. It was fun, challenging, and entertaining. Staff is knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful as well. Tyler was an excellent guide Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: Great time! We enjoyed it immensely.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: Did the Kidnapping. The challenge was fun and well-crafted. But the real great part was how nice and fun the staff was. Definitely intend to come back and give the other rooms a shot during the fall.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: I have done many escape rooms and this was one of my favorites. The kidnapped room was a bit too challenging for only 2 people, but the game master was great at managing our experience. She gave us hints when we needed them but stayed out of our way when we didn't. I would have liked more mechanical/electrical puzzles, but I imagine those are hard to do for a large chain versus a local company.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: I took the family out with one of the kids friends and we had a great time. We completed the kidnapped puzzle with just over two minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: Celebrated my 50th birthday by being kidnapped! Our group of five had a great time. The staff was very helpful, friendly and courteous. Will suggest this to all I know for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: Had the best time at Breakout today! We did Kidnapped. It was fun, challenging, and entertaining. Staff is knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful as well. Highly recommend!
